observatoryName.description: reports the station name or code

julianDay.description: current UTC expressed as a julian day

MJD.description: current UTC expressed as a modified julian day

DUT1.description: difference between UTC and UT1, in milli seconds

yPolarMotion.description: Pole motion towards the 90 east meridian

xPolarMotion.description: Pole motion towards the Greenwich meridian

xGeod.description: X geodetic coordinate of the observatory in meters

yGeod.description: Y geodetic coordinate of the observatory in meters

zGeod.description: Z geodetic coordinate of the observatory in meters

geodeticModel.description: model of the geoid used for place coordinates conversion
